Dear Planet spark,

I am writing to bring to your attention a concerning matter regarding our child's experience as a new student at Planet Spark. We enrolled our child in your practice/performance class with high hopes for their academic and personal development. However, we have encountered significant challenges that require your urgent attention and resolution.

Our child, MOULIK, has been struggling to effectively engage and learn in the class due to the teaching methodology employed by the instructor. The primary issue we have identified is that the teacher exclusively communicates in fluent English, which our child struggles to comprehend fully. Despite our child's earnest efforts to understand, they often find themselves unable to follow the instructions and grasp the concepts being taught.

Moreover, we have observed that the teacher tends to favor students who are already proficient in English communication. Instead of providing necessary support and encouragement to all students, she selectively interacts with those who are fluent speakers, leaving others, including our child, feeling neglected and demotivated.

Furthermore, when our child attempts to participate or seek clarification, the teacher often dismisses them with curt responses or ignores their inquiries altogether. It is disheartening to see our child's enthusiasm wane as a result of the teacher's indifference and lack of inclusive teaching practices.

We firmly believe that every student, regardless of their proficiency level in English or any other subject, deserves equal opportunities to learn and thrive in your esteemed institution. However, the current teaching approach employed in our child's class falls short of meeting this fundamental principle.

Therefore, we kindly request that immediate measures be taken to address the following concerns:

1. Implement inclusive teaching strategies that cater to the diverse needs and abilities of all students, including those who may require additional support in English comprehension.
2. Encourage open communication and foster a supportive learning environment where every student feels valued and empowered to participate actively.
3. Provide ongoing training and support to instructors to enhance their ability to effectively engage with students from diverse linguistic and cultural backgrounds.

We trust that you will take our concerns seriously and take prompt action to rectify the situation. As parents deeply invested in our child's education and well-being, we are committed to working collaboratively with you to ensure that Planet Spark remains a nurturing and inclusive learning environment for all students.

We appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to a positive resolution.

Sincerely,

PAWAN KUMAR 
FATHER OF MOULIK

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to discuss my recent
experience with the Business Communication course I enrolled in more
than a month ago. Unfortunately, despite my initial enthusiasm, I find
myself in a position where I must request a discontinuation of my
participation and a partial refund for the course.

Upon registration, I was under the impression that this course would
offer practical insights and direct applications in business
communication, a skill set I eagerly wanted to enhance, especially in
the context of preparing for job interviews during my notice period at
my current job. However, after attending 2 performance sessions and 3
practice sessions out of the planned 14 performance classes and 14
practice sessions, it has become evident that the course's focus leans
more towards theoretical aspects of English and general practice on
random topics, rather than the specialized business communication
skills I was seeking.

This misalignment, combined with the time constraints I am facing due
to job searching and interview preparations, has led me to the
difficult decision to not continue with the remaining classes. My
current circumstances require me to prioritize my time and resources
towards opportunities that align more closely with my immediate
professional development needs.

Given these reasons, I kindly request a partial refund for the course,
after deducting for the services provided in the first month. I
believe this request is reasonable under the circumstances, and I hope
for your understanding and positive response.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank your team for the
effort and resources provided thus far. Please let me know the process
for the refund and any additional information or actions required from
my end.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to your
prompt response.

Urgent Complaint and Demand for Refund: Misrepresentation and Poor Service

Dear Planetspark Customer Service,

I am writing to express my extreme dissatisfaction with the service provided by Planetspark and specifically, the sales representative Abhijeet Yadav. My experience with your company has been nothing short of frustrating and disappointing, and I am compelled to demand a refund for my course due to the gross misrepresentation and poor service I have encountered.

Prior to purchasing the course, Abhijeet Yadav assured me that I would have the flexibility to choose time slots for my daughter's sessions according to her availability in the evening hours. Based on this assurance, I opted for sessions on Sunday, Tuesday, and Friday between 4-5pm.

However, my onboarding experience with Planetspark was nothing short of pathetic. Abhijeet failed to share the platform details (LMS) in a timely manner, and to my dismay, the days and timeslots I had specifically chosen were arbitrarily changed to Monday and Wednesday without my consent or even a discussion on the matter.

When I attempted to address this issue by contacting Abhijeet, he ignored my calls and WhatsApp messages, leaving me frustrated and without a resolution. In desperation, I raised an assured callback request through the platform, hoping to receive assistance.

Subsequently, I received a call from Shivam from the operations team, who apologized for the inconvenience and assured me that the necessary changes would be made to accommodate my preferred timeslots. However, once again, my requests were disregarded, and Shivam failed to respond to my subsequent attempts to contact him.

This level of unprofessionalism and disregard for customer satisfaction is completely unacceptable. I am fed up with the whole experience I have had to endure, and I demand a full refund for my course.

I expect this matter to be resolved promptly and amicably. If my demand for a refund is not met satisfactorily, I will have no choice but to escalate this complaint further and seek recourse through other channels, including legal action if necessary.

I look forward to a prompt response and the immediate processing of my refund.

Regards,
Sharath Mascarenhas
